name: Slow Cooker Holiday Ham
description: The easiest no-fuss holiday ham ever made right in your crockpot. Set it and forget it for a ham so juicy, moist and flavorful!

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, whisk together orange marmalade, Dijon, orange juice and orange zest; set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, whisk together orange marmalade, Dijon, orange juice and orange zest; set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Place ham into a 6-qt slow cooker. Sprinkle with brown sugar, rubbing in thoroughly on all sides. Place whole cloves throughout and pour orange marmalade mixture over ham.
recipeInstructions.name: Place ham into a 6-qt slow cooker. Sprinkle with brown sugar, rubbing in thoroughly on all sides. Place whole cloves throughout and pour orange marmalade mixture over ham.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and cook on low heat for 4-5 hours, basting every hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and cook on low heat for 4-5 hours, basting every hour.

review.reviewBody: Just to know I can cook a ham in my slow cooker is enlightening. Thanks!
That was a genial idea! It saves me time that I can use doing the rest of the meal.

I realized way too late that the 10 lb ham I got wouldn't fit in my enormous crock pot. Well, I put it in a roaster, set the temp at 275F, prepared it as directed, and roasted for 3 hours.  It came out absolutely perfect.
